Judul: On the Interior Space Design of "With and Without"
Abstrak:
Interior space is the main target of Art and Design is to provide virtual body can enjoy the sway of various design elements environment indoors. This space is "virtual and real," "yes or no", the 
core issue is the interior design of the study. Space  is  the  main  study  object  of  interior  design, 
and  all  the  design  elements  of  vision  and touch in interior are finished with space design as
a carrier. Space provides a void environment for various interior design elements to fully enjoy the
sway and sprinkling and allow designers to show their  aesthetic  taste  entirely  like  a  stage  of  drama.  The  "virtuality  and  fictitiousness,""with  and without" of space design is the core issue of interior design studies.
Kata Kunci: Interior space design, Three-dimensional space, Fo ur-dimension
Sumber: Jiangxi science & technology normal university Chin a
